name: Five Nights at Knapkins
description:
A student's mechatronics project has gone rogue.

Hide in the principal's office as 5 deadly robots roam the school building in search of you. Close the oak doors, flash your light at the vent, but don't forget to check the security system to stay "in the know" about your attacker's whereabouts.

Five Nights at Knapkins is a spoof on the popular horror franchise Five Nights at Freddy's. It incorporates mechanics from throughout the game series, keeping you guessing throughout its runtime.

Developed over a period of about 2 months, Five Nights at Knapkins is my first full game, using free software to build a compelling and enjoyable gaming experience.

Download on PC, Mac or Android.
